name: The Unstoppable Exodia Incarnate
text:
5 "Forbidden One" monsters
①: Cannot be destroyed by an opponent's card effects.
②: Once per turn, if this card battles, during damage calculation: You can make this card gain ATK equal to your LP.
③: Once per turn, when a Spell/Trap Card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can negate that activation.
④: Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can Set 1 "Exodd" or "Obliterate!!!" Spell/Trap from your Deck.
⑤: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Lose 1000 LP.
